1.title: Fødselsdagen
1.plot: After last year's disaster of a birthday where Louis' mother Camilla and his stepmother Mette got in a quarrel in front of the whole class, Louis really don't want his parents back together this year.

2.title: Spilleregler
2.plot: It is not easy for Louis to keep track of all the different rules in his two very different homes. At father Jesper Louis likes to draw on the wall, but shooting games are strictly prohibited. At mother Camilla it is just the opposite.

3.title: Forældrefælden
3.plot: For the school's annual bazaar Louis is trying to recreate the atmosphere of his mother's and father's wedding trip to Paris. Louis has got the brilliant idea - he thinks himself - that he will bring his parents together again.

4.title: Kærlighedseksperterne
4.plot: All eyes are pointed on Louis as he does everything to get the courage to invite Maja to his home. Love expert Viktor is immediately ready with advice for Louis, but it turns out that Viktor's own love life is not exactly running smoothly.

5.title: Money, Money, Money
5.plot: Louis dreams of getting the cool new skateboard - the same brand as Maja has. But how can he afford it? Viola and Louis are going all in, setting up their own business where they sell teddy bear monsters.

6.title: Graffitimesteren
6.plot: Louis' wildest dream come true; Louis is selected to join the graffiti team to paint Scandinavia's longest graffiti wall in Malmö. It is crazy and Louis feels invincible.

imdb.plot outline: Child of divorced parents, Louis 12 years old, lives a hectic life, where he stays half of the time with his father and half the time with his mother. Louis has two of everything - two homes, two sets of parents, two step siblings, two rooms and soon two personalities, because life feels pretty schizophrenic: at his father Jesper and step mom Mette you'll find fresh spelled buns, yoga and homemade everything, and stepbrother Victor 15 years old, who is the ladies' friend, and always ready with good advice. At mother Camilla's and stepfather Chris you'll find prevailing entrepreneurial spirit, here is efficiency, bulging refrigerators, and the latest gadgets and stepsister Viola 10 years old, that operates the business from her jewelry designer shop room. Louis loves to draw, and he draws on everything he can get near. Together with his friend Conrad Louis must manage with teasing from Storm and Frederik in the schoolyard, and do his part to be closer to sweet Maja from the class.
imdb.title: Mit 50/50 liv
plot: Child of divorced parents, Louis 12 years old, has two of everything - two homes, two sets of parents, two step siblings, two rooms and soon two personalities, because life feels pretty schizophrenic.
